transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Kanhaiya ji mere ko hello.
Customer: Hello aawaz aa rahi hai sir?
Executive: Haan ji Kanhaiya ji bataiye namaskar sir.
Customer: Ji sir namaskar sir namaskar hum to number laga rahe hai sir busy chal raha hai aaj.
Executive: Haan thoda sa main busy tha bataiye.
Customer: Achcha main ye keh raha hu sir main dekh raha hu char panch din se dekh raha hu main problem ye bahut sari aa rahi hai isme koi valid nahi aa rahi hai ek aa gaya to nahi wohi do HP me teen HP me panch HP me koi valid nahi aa rahi hai sir kaha dikkat aa rahi hai kaha problem aa rahi hai sir.
Executive: Buyleads nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Buyleads nahi aa rahi hai sir do HP me teen HP me ye koi buyleads to hai nahi hamara sir isse koi matlab hai nahi hai na.
Executive: Achcha thik hai aapne customer care number pe call kara tha sir 9696 pe.
Customer: Maine kal customer care se number pe kal parso baat kari shanivar ko us din chutti thi.
Executive: Kyunki maine baat sunai.
Customer: Haan ji ji ji.
Executive: 9696 pe hi call kara tha aapne.
Customer: Ji ji sir ji sir.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: To maine unhe sari cheez batai unhone kaha aapke jo hai woh jo aap Amritsar se baat kare main aapko unka number send kar dungi nahi madam number mere pe hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan to kaha nahi kya Monday aap jo samasya hai aapki Monday ko thik hogi.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Woh Madhya Pradesh se.
Executive: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Aapne check kara usko.
Customer: Multi screen aata chakki machine ki chahiye thi unke requirement.
Customer: Sir Madhya Pradesh se ek buylead aayi thi teen din mein aap anuman laga sakte hai kya teen din mein ek hi buylead aayegi sir kya mujhe ye bataye.
Executive: Abhi nahi main che ghante pehle ki bhi baat kar raha hu main teen din se keh raha hu main teen main shanivar se aap iska pura kholo aur mujhe aap meeting zone me le aur usme dekhe ki isme buylead kitni aayi hui hai isme.
Customer: Thik kyuki do HP me ek HP me teen HP me kya fayda sir hamara inse bataiye mujhe panch HP me jabki iska koi hamara koi procedure hi nahi hai basic wala koi matlab hi nahi hai ya kahi humse ya koi ye nahi meri baat suniye sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Main ab main yaha naukri kar raha hu woh mere pe dalte hai pressure main kisse kahunga sir aap samajhdar hai sir ji ab woh kahe aap baat karo kaha kaha dikkat aa rahi hai kaha nahi aa rahi hai aap buylead nahi utha rahe ho buylead aaye tabhi to main uthaunga buylead.
Executive: Ji main check kar raha hu.
Customer: Woh ye keh rahe hai ki maine paisa pura de diya meri sari cheeze ab kaha dikkat aa rahi hai kisse baat kare hum.
Executive: Ji bilkul aap sahi keh rahe hai main dekhta hu usme dikkat kya aa rahi hai main ek baar check karata hu aap line pe rahe.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Hello Kanhaiya ji bataiye karaiye karaiye sir baat ko.
Executive: Ek minute line pe bane rahiye call disconnect mat kariyega.
Customer: Bataiye main main kehta hu ki Amritsar se baat woh kehte hai Amritsar se baat karo.
Executive: Main laau ek baar check karke.
Customer: Bataiye bataiye sir se baat karta hu.
Executive: Ek second ruke rahe manager sir mere thode se client se busy hai bas jaise hi khali ho rahe hai main aapki baat karata hu unse thik hai.
Executive: Aap hello.
Customer: Haan ji ji sir bataiye karaiye baat.
Executive: Haan bas ek second aap line pe bane rahiye.
Customer: Sir ye iske hame mere se baat hone se pehle aapko kisi ne call kara tha kya.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Mere ko call karne se pehle aapse kisi se baat hoti thi.
Customer: Baat nahi baat kisi se hui nahi aapne kaha na ki aapko aapko jo banda follow karega woh turant call kar lega.
Customer: Hmm ab mere paas to kisi kisi bande ka phone nahi aaya batao bolo teen din se dekh raha hu main koi buylead hi nahi aa rahi hai kisse baat karu batao main to main aapko hi karunga na information.
Executive: Sir se baat kara hai aaj.
Customer: Nahi abhi abhi baat hui hai sir se abhi tumhare tumhare se pehle sir se baat hui hai abhi.
Executive: Sir ne kya bataya aapko.
Customer: Unhone ye kaha tha ki aapka sari cheeze thik hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur maine kaha catalog thik hai hamara kaha aapka catalog thik hai maine kaha fir kya problem aa rahi hai hamare liye kyuki jo ki ye buylead aa rahi hai woh do HP me teen HP panch HP me ye koi buylead thodi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: 10 se 15 HP ki buyleads honi chahiye thi.
Customer: Are sir 10 se upar honi chahiye humne kya fayda sir isse bataiye mujhe.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Main check karwata hu.
Customer: Aap check karwaiye kaha problem aa rahi hai kya dikkat hai aap bataiye mujhe fir main aapki Dheeraj sir se baat karata hu bhai jab jab mamla hath me nahi rahega fir main unse baat karaunga.
Executive: Haan nahi usme koi pareshan hone wali baat nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi sir bataiye teen din ho gaye teen din se paise pura de diya sari cheeze ho gayi hai fir kaha dikkat hai sir kaha problem hai ya to catalog dikkat to batao photo hai ya photo nahi ya unhone jo manga tha woh sari cheez de di unhone maine baat karai thi Dheeraj sir ki.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Sare system de diye ab problem aa kaha rahi hai baat ye hai na ki system kaha chal raha hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji bilkul aapka kehna jayaj hai sir.
Executive: Main dekh raha hu.
Customer: Ab aapne ab ab sir abhi aapne kaha tha na che ghante pehle aapne che ghante pehle dikhai kya che ghante me ek hi buylead aayegi fir kya fayda hamara ye ye service basic wali service thik hai.
Executive: Pareshan nahi hote sir ji main hu main keh raha hu main baat kara raha hu main.
Customer: Sir ji mera unhone aaj mera unhone kya hai aaj matlab ye keh diya bhai tum naukri kar rahe ho tum to baat nahi kar sakte unse batao tum baat kaun se kar sakte ho aur unka bhi kehna jayaj hai bhai hum tumse baat nahi kare chalao fir kya samasya karenge buylead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji bilkul main main connect kara raha hu aapko ek minute baat kariyega sir ek second.
Executive: Namaste sir.
Executive: Sir ye Brave Agro Engineering.

Executive: Hello Kanhaiya ji.
Customer: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Main jis department mein aapki service live karaya tha us department mein ek baar connect karke call karke batata hu kya problem aa rahi hai thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai baat kariye aap.
Executive: Thik hai ek second.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Buyleads received are not relevant (2-5 HP).

- Feels passed between executives without resolution.



Resolution:

- Executive will check the system for issues.

- Executive will connect with relevant department.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back with updates.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, resolution
